item.title: 在美国通胀和欧洲央行之前，欧洲股市反弹乏力
item.description: 欧洲股市在周一反弹后表现平淡，因为在美国关键通胀数据和欧洲央行本周晚些时候召开政策会议之前，市场开始谨慎。【原文：European stocks were muted after Monday’s bounce, as caution set in ahead of key US inflation figures and the European Central Bank’s policy meeting later in the week.】

item.title: 华为在 iPhone 16 亮相数小时后推出售价 2,800 美元的三折手机
item.description: 就在苹果公司发布其最新款 iPhone 之后，华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co.【原文：Huawei Technologies Co. announced the world’s first commercial device with two folds, claiming leadership in mobile design just after Apple Inc. unveiled its latest iPhones.】

item.title: 捷克通胀率高于预期加深了中央银行的困境
item.description: 捷克 8 月份的通胀率高于预期，使央行对进一步放宽货币政策步伐的审议变得更加复杂。【原文：Czech inflation was faster than expected in August, complicating the central bank’s deliberations about the pace of further monetary easing.】

item.title: 谨慎交易员为可能 "举足轻重 "的特朗普-哈里斯辩论做好准备
item.description: 在美国副总统卡马拉-哈里斯和前总统唐纳德-特朗普举行首场总统辩论之前，权衡选举风险的投资者已经比 6 月份特朗普和他曾经的对手乔-拜登总统在台上会面之前更加惶恐不安了。【原文：Investors weighing election risks ahead of the first US presidential debate between Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Donald Trump are already a lot more jittery than they were before Trump and his onetime opponent, President Joe Biden, met onstage in June.】

item.title: 匈牙利通胀放缓程度超出预期，减息理由更加充分
item.description: 匈牙利的通胀放缓幅度超过预期，为央行恢复降息提供了支持。【原文：Hungary’s inflation slowed more than expected, bolstering the case for the central bank to resume interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 挪威核心通胀率持续放缓提升降息概率
item.description: 挪威8月份的基本通胀率连续第10个月下降，这为该国央行今年降息敞开了大门。【原文：Norway’s underlying inflation rate declined for the 10th month in a row in August, keeping the door open for an interest-rate cut this year by the country’s central bank.】

item.title: 盎格鲁黄金公司出价约 25 亿美元收购黄金矿商 Centamin
item.description: 盎格鲁黄金阿散蒂公司（AngloGold Ashanti Ltd.）提出收购Centamin Plc公司，交易价值约为19亿英镑（25亿美元）。【原文：AngloGold Ashanti Ltd. has offered to buy Centamin Plc in a deal that values the gold miner at about £1.9 billion ($2.5 billion).】

item.title: 投资者寄望印度和韩国填补美国生物安全法案的空白
item.description: 一项限制美国企业与中国某些生物技术公司交易的法案提案正在寻求受益者。【原文：Investors are seeking beneficiaries of a proposed bill that would limit American businesses’ dealings with some Chinese biotechnology firms.】

item.title: 英国薪资增速降至两年新低，英国央行继续保持宽松政策
item.description: 在截至 7 月份的三个月中，英国的薪资增长降至两年来的最低点，薪资压力再次下降，这使得英国央行有望在今年再次降息。【原文：UK pay growth cooled to a two-year low in the three months through July, another step down in wage pressures that keeps the Bank of England on track to cut interest rates again this year.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利预计欧洲央行降息升级，欧元将下挫 7
item.description: 摩根士丹利认为，随着欧洲央行加大宽松政策力度以应对经济衰退，欧元将在几个月内滑向与美元平价的水平。【原文：Morgan Stanley sees the euro sliding toward parity with the dollar within months, as the European Central Bank dials up policy easing to tackle a faltering economy.】

item.title: 橡树树校友为首支私募股权基金获得 4 亿欧元投资承诺
item.description: 由前橡树资本（Oaktree Capital）董事总经理共同创立的 Sienna Private Equity 在募集其首支基金时，已获得超过 4 亿欧元（4.42 亿美元）的投资者承诺。【原文：Sienna Private Equity, co-founded by former Oaktree Capital managing directors, has secured more than €400 million ($442 million) of investor commitments as it raises its debut fund.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市低开
item.description: 伦敦金融城一英里广场。摄影师：何塞-萨门托-马托斯/彭博社【原文：The Square Mile financial district of the City of London. Photographer: Jose Sarmento Matos/Bloomberg】

item.title: 台积电八月营收增长 33%，因人工智能芯片需求强劲
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.’s revenue rose 33% last month, in a positive signal to investors betting on a smartphone market recovery and sustained demand for Nvidia Corp.’s AI chips.】

item.title: 欧洲根本不具备条件
item.description:
德拉吉正确地指出了问题所在，但欧元区的竞争力危机牵一发而动全身，不可能一蹴而就。【原文：

Draghi correctly identifies the problem, but the eurozone’s competitivity crisis has too many moving parts for a straightforward fix. 

】

item.title: 埃及燃料价格上涨，通胀率数月来首次上升
item.description: 燃料补贴下调后，埃及通胀加快，打破了连续五个月的减速趋势，为 2020 年以来的首次降息铺平了道路。【原文：Egyptian inflation quickened after a reduction in fuel subsidies, disrupting a five-month streak of deceleration that was paving the way for the first interest-rate cut since 2020.】

item.title: 安联将向加拿大 Omers 公司出售印度公路运营商 Interise 的股份
item.description: 安大略省地方政府职工养老基金同意购买安联资本合伙公司在 Interise 信托公司的股份，从而提高了其在印度收费公路业务中的风险敞口。【原文：Ontario’s pension fund for local government workers agreed to buy Allianz Capital Partners’ stake in Interise Trust, boosting its exposure to the Indian toll-road business.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

 

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 铂金赤字将创纪录，但价格尚未回升
item.description: 据一份行业报告称，铂金市场预计将出现至少十年来最大的年度赤字，但迄今为止价格反应迟缓。【原文：The platinum market is expected to see its biggest annual deficit in at least a decade, but prices have so far been slow to react, according to an industry report.】

item.title: 欧洲央行可能降息，中国重回欧债市场
item.description: 在欧洲央行可能降息之际，中国在中断三年后重返国际债务市场，计划出售欧元债券。【原文：China is returning to the international debt market after a three-year hiatus, planning to sell euro-denominated bonds amid a likely interest rate cut by the European Central Bank.】

item.title: 取消 "股票通 "后，中国房地产股大跌
item.description: 一些中国开发商的股票在内地投资者无法进入后在香港下跌，这标志着陷入困境的中国房地产行业再次遭遇挫折。【原文：Shares of some Chinese developers dropped in Hong Kong after they were made inaccessible to investors in the mainland, marking another setback for the beleaguered sector.】

item.title: 新加坡将在必要时 "果断 "采取更多住房限制措施
item.description: 新加坡在 8 月份采取了最新一轮的降温措施，以提高公共住房的可负担性，此后，新加坡将继续密切关注私人和公共住房转售市场的情况。【原文：Singapore will continue to monitor the private and public housing resale markets closely following its latest round of cooling measures in August to boost the affordability of public flats.】

item.title: 大石油公司面临 "汗流浃背"。有些人不适合
item.description:
该行业已经获得了丰厚的回报 通过回购向股东派发了大笔资金，但 可持续性仍然是个问题。【原文：

The industry has enjoyed a bonanza leading to bumper payouts to shareholders via buybacks, but sustainability remains in question.

】

item.title: 欧洲央行即将缩小利率差，原因如下
item.description: 欧洲中央银行本周可能做出第二次降低借贷成本的决定，这一次将有一个相当技术性的转折。【原文：The European Central Bank’s likely decision this week to lower borrowing costs for a second time will come with a rather technical twist this time round.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯 "2030 愿景 "项目价值达 1.3 万亿美元
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯在过去八年中启动了 1.3 万亿美元的房地产和基础设施项目，作为其经济多元化计划的一部分，以摆脱石油，成为一个更具吸引力的居住、工作和旅游地。【原文：Saudi Arabia has launched $1.3 trillion in real estate and infrastructure projects over the past eight years as part of its plan to diversify the economy away from oil and become a more attractive place to live, work and travel.】

item.title: 俄罗斯油轮拒绝主要丹麦飞行员，漏油担忧加剧
item.description: 通过丹麦危险的海峡运输俄罗斯原油的油轮越来越多地拒绝驾驶员的服务，这增加了该国沿海发生石油泄漏的可能性。【原文：Tankers hauling Russian crude through Denmark’s perilous shipping straits are increasingly rejecting the services of pilots when they do so, raising the the chances of an oil spill off the country’s coast.】

item.title: 中国建筑商融创和罗兰酝酿地方债务重组计划
item.description: 随着拖欠债务者将重组重点从全球债权人转移，中国两大开发商正逐步接近于公布其地方债务重组计划。【原文：Two major Chinese developers are moving closer to unveiling plans to overhaul their local debt, as defaulters shift their restructuring focus from global creditors.】

item.title: 中国出口超出预期，经济出现罕见亮点
item.description: 中国 8 月份出口意外回升，为受通缩压力拖累的经济带来了难得的提振，但这也加剧了与贸易伙伴的紧张关系。【原文：China’s exports unexpectedly picked up in August, providing a rare boost for an economy weighed down by deflationary pressures, though this has stoked tensions with trade partners.】

item.title: 投资者期待印度 2024 年最大 IPO 带来巨大收益
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 中国住房困境使万科、龙湖深陷困境
item.description: 在房屋销售数据凸显出房地产市场下滑加剧之后，中国最受关注的一些房地产开发商的业绩下滑幅度达到了几个月来的最大值。【原文：Some of China’s most closely watched property developers slid by the most in months, after home sales data underscored a worsening real estate slump.】

item.title: 肺癌药物试验结果喜忧参半，第一三共暴跌
item.description: 第一三共公司与阿斯利康公司合作开发的肺癌药物在一项三期试验中的结果喜忧参半，该公司股价周二下跌10.4%，创8月5日以来最大跌幅。【原文：Daiichi Sankyo Co. shares drop as much as 10.4% on Tuesday, the most since Aug. 5, after its lung cancer drug with AstraZeneca showed mixed results in a phase 3 trial.】
